summary: This is a news article from the New York Post summarizing allegations from a victim in the Jeffrey Epstein case. It describes how Epstein lost sexual interest in a victim after she became pregnant and then coerced her into recruiting other underage girls for him.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central figure in the case, accused of sexual abuse and coercing a pregnant victim to recruit other underage girls.

events.title: Epstein coerces pregnant victim to recruit
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein allegedly lost sexual interest in a victim after she became pregnant and then made her recruit other underage girls for him.

keyFacts: A victim in the Jeffrey Epstein case became pregnant.
Epstein lost sexual interest in the victim after she became pregnant.
Epstein then coerced the pregnant victim to recruit other underage girls for him.
